text:
What's the buzz, Andrew W.K.?
                
                    
                    Neilson Barnard/Getty Images
                    
                
hide caption What's the buzz, Andrew W.K.? Musician, motivational speaker, and party pro Andrew W.K. is a man of many talents—but did you know that he is also an expert on Jesus Christ Superstar? We wrote him a quiz on his favorite rock opera. After the game, hear he and house musician Jonathan Coulton duet on "What's The Buzz." Sponsor Message Become an NPR sponsor
title: Andrew W.K.: Jesus Christ Super Quiz : NPR
